text: Silas Hite (born March 30, 1980) is an American composer, multi- instrumentalist, record producer and visual artist. == Early life == Hite was born in Scottsdale, Arizona to Patrick Hite and Amy Mothersbaugh. == Other websites == * * Category:1980 births Category:21st-century American composers Category:American movie score composers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Scottsdale, Arizona
title: Silas Hite
